title: How to Draw the Indian Flag

steps.headline: Divide it into three equal horizontal sections.
Color the topmost section with saffron color.
Color the bottom most section with dark green color.
Draw a navy blue circle at the centre of the middle section.
Divide the circle into 4 equal sections.
Draw 5 navy blue spokes between every section so that you end up with 24 spokes in total.

text: Draw a rectangle.  Divide it into three equal horizontal sections.  Color the topmost section with saffron color.  Color the bottom most section with dark green color.  Draw a navy blue circle at the centre of the middle section.  Divide the circle into 4 equal sections.  Draw 5 navy blue spokes between every section so that you end up with 24 spokes in total.
